title: Goar

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Perform the factional kill by swinging your horns towards your target, also roleblocking them due to their overpowering size.
- Goar's ultimate ability, During the day, Goar rears up on its back legs and roars, delivering a yellow blast to them, during the next night, they will be unable to do any actions and must choose whether they are Modkilled or Survive, if all players pick survive, all are Modkilled.  (1 use, shared by Killing mutants)

fields.name: Passives:
fields.value:
- Goar gains Powerful defense when Blocking.
- Goar has passive Basic defense, it is permanently lost when roleblocked.

desc:
Post 4063
*A large, red, quadrupedal titan hybrid between a grizzly bear and a boar, Its most prominent features are its long horns and massive tusks.*
